'''2.7.12''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on August 9, 2023.

== Additions ==
* Added [[Quick Play]] for Java Edition.

== Fixes ==
* Back-end fixes & access improvements.
* Various UI fixes & updates
* {{bug|MCL-23424}} - Minecraft Legends logo is low resolution.
* {{bug|MCL-23663}} - Realms tab in launcher does not use custom scroll bar.</onlyinclude>
